Text.Page:
I brought a shipment of young piglings to give the troops a good home-cooked meal.

Unfortunately, some escaped last night. I've got a lot of mouths to feed today. I need that meat. Think you can help me out?"Where are they?"

Try east of the fortress's entrance. They're probably scrounging for food.

Happy hunting.

Fine work, my friend. Our soldiers deserve any morale boosters they can get.

Now, do I smoke, roast, or grill them. Battle bacon?
Did you find the {@LinkCreature:48#100}s yet? I've got hungry bellies to fill.
